POLYGON.MAP_INSTRUCTIONS: Map displays the coordinates entered below
POLYGON.MAP_NOTE: Note: This is a placeholder. In a real implementation, integrate with a mapping service like Google Maps or Leaflet.
POLYGON.DUPLICATE_POINTS: Duplicate points are not allowed in the polygon

VALIDATION.SITE_NAME_LENGTH: The site name must contain number of characters in the range 3 to 100 characters
VALIDATION.POLYGON_NAME_LENGTH: The polygon name must contain number of characters in the range 3 to 100 characters
VALIDATION.ENGLISH_TEXT: Please enter valid input using English letters, and the following special characters: [ - , _ , space, .]
VALIDATION.ENGLISH_TEXT_SPECIAL_ONLY: Invalid input: special characters must be combined with letters or numbers.
VALIDATION.ARABIC_TEXT: Please enter valid input using Arabic letters, and the following special characters: [ - , _ , space, .]
VALIDATION.ARABIC_TEXT_SPECIAL_ONLY: Invalid input: special characters must be combined with letters or numbers.
VALIDATION.MIXED_TEXT: Please enter valid input using Arabic/English letters, and the following special characters: [ - , _ , space, .]
VALIDATION.MIXED_TEXT_SPECIAL_ONLY: Invalid input: special characters must be combined with letters or numbers.
VALIDATION.PRICE_FORMAT: Price must have up to 2 decimal places (e.g., 5, 5.5, 5.50)
VALIDATION.SLOTS_RANGE: The number of slots should be in the range of 1 to 10000 slot
VALIDATION.SITE_NAME_EXISTS: The site name is already existed
VALIDATION.SITE_NAME_EXISTS_AT_LEVEL: A site with the same name already exists at this level
VALIDATION.SITE_NAME_SAME_AS_PARENT: Site name cannot be the same as its parent name
VALIDATION.UNIQUE_NAME: This name is already in use
VALIDATION.UNIQUE_POLYGON: This polygon name is already in use

MESSAGES.POLYGON_REQUIRED: Polygon must be added before saving a leaf site
MESSAGES.SELECT_SITE: Select a site from the tree to view details
MESSAGES.PARENT_SITE_INFO: This will be created as a Parent Site. To create a Leaf Site, use the "+" button next to a parent site in the tree.

WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome to Admin Portal
WELCOME.SUBTITLE: Parking Management System
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Manage your parking sites, configure polygons, and monitor your parking infrastructure with our comprehensive admin portal.
WELCOME.FEATURE_1_DESC: Create and manage parent and leaf parking sites with hierarchical organization.
WELCOME.FEATURE_2_DESC: Define precise parking areas using coordinate-based polygon mapping.
WELCOME.FEATURE_3_DESC: Monitor and control your parking infrastructure in real-time.
